name: Word Search Game for Marvel & DC: Suicide Squad Edition
name_original: Word Search Game for Marvel & DC: Suicide Squad Edition
description:
This Word Search Game is about the bad guys which fight the evil. We included hundreds of words around Harley Quinn, Joker and co. Find the hidden words inside the letter labyrinth and master different quests. Use jokers and solve all puzzles. Just use your finger to mark the words. Play the same puzzle again and get to see different words.

Have fun!
